meta_description: Support bitcircus101 with your donation. Help us maintain our creative and tech space in Bonn, Germany.
donate_intro: Your generous donations help us maintain our creative and tech space in Bonn. Every contribution, no matter the size, makes a difference in keeping our community thriving.
donate_choose_method: Choose your preferred donation method below:
donate_decline_msg: You declined cookies. Donation options are unavailable.
donate_notice_text: This page uses third-party payment services (PayPal, Ko-fi, Stripe) and Google services (reCAPTCHA, SOCS) that may set cookies to process donations securely and prevent fraud.
donate_notice_payments: PayPal, Ko-fi, Stripe: Cookies for secure payment processing (see their privacy policies).
donate_notice_google: Google (reCAPTCHA, SOCS): Cookies for fraud prevention, bot protection, and payment security.
donate_notice_learn_more: Learn more about our privacy policy
